title: The 50 Megaton Tweet
description: Tragic mistake? Elaborate hoax? Or terrorist attack? When social media breaks the news that the President of the United States has been assassinated, the world is completely taken by surprise. Left scrambling in the aftermath of the Presidentâ€™s death, big media and government struggle to control the whirlwind of public opinion, but the age of information has passed them by. Soon, they find themselves at the mercy of the very technologies they once embraced.
author: R.C. Wade
